articles.author: Rosemary Potter
articles.title: “They’ve Mapped the Beginning of Time!”: James Webb Telescope Reveals the Largest-Ever Cosmic Atlas, Unveiling 13 Billion Years of Hidden Universe - Rude Baguette
articles.description: IN A NUTSHELL 🌌 The **largest-ever map** of the universe reveals nearly 800,000 galaxies, spanning 13.5 billion years. 🔭 The **James Webb Space Telescope** utilized advanced infrared technology to capture distant cosmic images. 🖥️ **Innovative data process…
